name: Researchskills
tagline: Lecture notes for research skills course
body:
### General infos This site contains material and links for the MSc course Research Skills. Some background to the course [here](http://florianhartig.wordpress.com/teaching/research-skills/). Some important material * [Syllabus](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/blob/master/Syllabus/Syllabus2014.pdf?raw=true) / timetable for the course * [Campus online](https://www.verwaltung.uni-freiburg.de/lsfserver/rds?state=verpublish&status=init&vmfile=no&publishid=138902&moduleCall=webInfo&publishConfFile=webInfo&publishSubDir=veranstaltung) * Ilias page - course material will be posted here ### Lecture notes This is still work in progress, but I'm planning to distribute some lecture notes for this course. ### Labs / tutorials We will do a few practical exercises. Y * R / Stats: script, example, [stats help website](http://biometry.github.io/APES/) (experimental) * LaTex: script, example ### Authors and copyright

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
